tables.table_title: Comparison of the HV values among the RAR-GA without grouping constraint (no GC), P-EDA without grouping constraint (no GC), KC-EDA without grouping constraint (no GC), Kmean-GA with grouping constraint (GC) and KC-EDA with grouping constraint (GC).
